# Title 
[Titre]
## Armor Rock Installation at Grande Entrée Harbor - Island of Grande Entrée

# Tender Details
### Solicitation Number
*Solicitation Number: 30005201*
### Tender Closing Date
*Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-13T14:00:00*
### Expected Contract Start Date
*Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-12-18*
### Expected Contract End Date
*Expected Contract End Date: 2024-06-30*

# Notice Details
*Notice Type: Request for Proposal*
*Procurement Category: CNST*
*Explanation of Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding*
*Selection Criteria: Lowest Price*
*Explanation of Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*

# Opportunity Details
*Region of Opportunity: Canada*
*Region of Delivery: Gaspésie–Îles-de-la-Madeleine*
*Region of Use: Gaspésie–Îles-de-la-Madeleine*

# Specification Description 
SCOPE OF WORK

The project involves, among other things, demolishing existing structures, excavating and managing the wharf backfill, installing new armor rock protection, and undertaking necessary construction tasks.

Prior to submitting a bid, bidders are encouraged to visit the site and gather relevant information about weather conditions, soil conditions, and other circumstances that may affect the work.

CONSTRUCTION TIME

The successful contractor is required to complete all work by April 26, 2024.

# Contact Details
*Name of Contact: Florence Laurin*
*Email of Contact: florence.laurin@dfo-mpo.gc.ca*
*Phone Number of Contact: (450) 495-0432*
